entry.name: MAV_CMD_NAV_WAYPOINT_WAIT_RC
entry.description: Navigate to MISSION and wait for RC command for next mission.--weidong
entry.param: Hold time in decimal seconds. (ignored by fixed wing, time to stay at MISSION for rotary wing)
Acceptance radius in meters (if the sphere with this radius is hit, the MISSION counts as reached)
0 to pass through the WP, if > 0 radius in meters to pass by WP. Positive value for clockwise orbit, negative value for counter-clockwise orbit. Allows trajectory control.
Desired yaw angle at MISSION (rotary wing)
Latitude
Longitude
Altitude

entry.name: MAV_CMD_NAV_SWEEP_INDOOR
entry.description: Starts a search with sweep type route--weidong
entry.param: initial x position, where sweep start
initial y position, where sweep start
z coordinate, sweep process will follow this altitude
Desired yaw angle at sweep (rotary wing)
side a of sweep
side b of sweep
width d of adjacent line

entry.name: MAV_CMD_NAV_SLAM_PATHPLAN
entry.description: Starts a search with sweep type route--weidong
entry.param: initial x position, where sweep start
initial y position, where sweep start
z coordinate, sweep process will follow this altitude
Desired yaw angle at sweep (rotary wing)
destination x position
destination y position
IDLE temp

message.name: UWB_POSITION_ESTIMATE
message.field: Timestamp (microseconds, synced to UNIX time or since system boot)
